page.title: 16 John Whites Sports Ground
page.content: John Whites is a private sports ground on the edge of Rushden; it is linked with a famous shoe factory. It was once two farms until John White bought it to build a house, however he built it elsewhere. He decided to turn the 11 acres into a sports ground with golf, bowls, tennis and a club house, which holds about 90 people. To become a member you pay a membership fee. At the ground, golf seems to be the most popular game and is played all the year through. Bowls is also a popular sport, the season lasting from May to September (you need plenty of skill and practice to play it). Tennis is not popular at all. The groundsman is proud of his ground and looks after it well.
